selectListings.heading: Select Listings
selectListings.description: Choose the listings and post type for your bulk import.

uploadFile.heading: Upload File
uploadFile.description: Upload your CSV file for bulk post import.

qualityControl.heading: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Review your uploaded file validation results.
qualityControl.validationErrorsTitle: Validation Errors Found - Please fix and re-upload
qualityControl.notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this import...

submit.heading: Congratulations!
submit.description: All your posts have been successfully imported in bulk.

errors.title: Error
errors.selectListing: Please select at least one listing.
errors.selectPostType: Please select a valid post type.
errors.selectFile: Please select a file to upload.
errors.noUploadedFile: No uploaded file found. Please upload a file first.
errors.sampleNotAvailable: Sample CSV file is not available. Please go back to step 1.
errors.csvGenerateFailed: Failed to generate CSV file. Please try again.
errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload file. Please try again.
errors.saveFailed: Failed to save bulk sheet. Please try again.
errors.authFailed: Authentication failed. Please log in again.
errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again later.

success.title: Success
success.uploadWithErrors: File uploaded with {{count}} validation errors. Please review.
